hero.title: ITHULUZI LOMNOTHO OLUHLAZA
hero.paragraph1: INingizimu Afrika kanye nomhlaba wonke bayashintsha baye emnothweni oluhlaza, futhi lokho kwakha amathuba amaningi amabhizinisi emikhakheni yezokuvuselela, ukulungisa kanye nokukhiqiza kabusha.
hero.paragraph2: Sifuna ukwabelana ngala mathuba nawe, ngakho sisiza abantu abangosomabhizinisi ukuthi bakhulise umnotho wabo kakhulu ngokuphindwe kayishumi. Ithuluzi Lomnotho Oluhlaza lisiza ohulumeni nezikhungo ukuthi zihlele ukushintsha kwazo ziye emnothweni oluhlaza. Kusukela emibonweni, ibhange lamabhizinisi aluhlaza uzothola ulwazi oluhlaza, ukusekelwa kanye nentuthuko yokushintsha izinhlobo zabo zamabhizinisi ajwayelekile zibe umnotho oluhlaza.
hero.paragraph3: Sikusiza ukuhlanganisa umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo wokuthi ungawathola kanjani amanzuzo omnotho oluhlaza futhi ubeke ibhizinisi lakho ukuze lisebenze ngendlela eluhlaza yomhlaba.

focus.title: Izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye ezibalulekile zomnotho oluhlaza eNingizimu Afrika
focus.subtitle: (Ingqungquthela Yomnotho Oluhlaza, 2010)
focus.waste: Ukuphathwa kwemfucuza okusimeme kanye nokugaywa kabusha

card1.title: Ngebhizinisi lakho
card1.paragraph1: Umhlaba uya emnothweni oluhlaza, futhi iNingizimu Afrika kumele yenze njalo uma izoqhubeka nokuhweba emhlabeni jikelele. Izakhiwo zethu ezikhona kanye nemiklamo emisha kumele yakhiwe, isetshenziswe, igcinwe, futhi ibe ngabanikazi ngendlela esimeme, kanye nengqalasizinda entsha kumele yakhiwe ngokwezinqubo eziluhlaza, ukuze ingasebenzisi amandla namanzi amaningi, futhi umsebenzi waseNingizimu Afrika kumele wenziwe kahle.
card1.paragraph2: Yilapho wena ungena khona. Kodwa uqinisekisa kanjani ukuthi ungawathola amanye ala masebenzi?

card2.title: Ngekusasa lakho
card2.paragraph1: Uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ukhethe izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye okumele zigxile kuzo ekushintsheni kumnotho oluhlaza: ezolimo, amandla (ahlanzekile futhi asebenzayo), ukugcinwa kwezinsiza zemvelo nokuphathwa (okuhlanganisa nezimayini), ukuthutha okusimeme kanye nengqalasizinda, ukusimama kwemvelo (okuhlanganisa imfundo yezokuvakasha), izakhiwo eziluhlaza kanye nendawo eyakhiwe, ukuphathwa kwemfucuza okusimeme kanye nokugaywa kabusha, ukuphathwa kwamanzi, kanye nokukhiqiza nokusetshenziswa okusimeme.
card2.paragraph2: Thola ngamathuba omnotho oluhlaza emkhakheni we-IRM.

joinNetwork.title: Joyina Inethiwekhi Yomnotho Oluhlaza ye-SAGE
joinNetwork.description: Thola amathuba osomabhizinisi ngaphakathi kwezinhlelo zomnotho oluhlaza, ukusiza ukuxhuma osomabhizinisi komunye nomunye kanye nezimakethe, kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwezimali nebhizinisi.

opportunities.title: Amathuba
opportunities.description: Thola amathuba emisebenzi yakamuva njengoba etholakala ngaphakathi kwesikhala somnotho oluhlaza – kusukela ocwaningweni kanye nezinto ezintsha kuya ekukhiqizeni nasezinsizeni.

events.title: Ikhalenda Yemicimbi
events.description: Buka ikhalenda yemicimbi ephilayo futhi uxhumane nosomabhizinisi kanye nochwepheshe ngaphakathi kwesikhala somnotho oluhlaza ngeplathifomu yethu yemicimbi.

info.title: Thola ngamathuba okuthengwa kwezimpahla, ukufinyelela ezimakethe, ukuqeqeshwa, kanye nokusekelwa kwentuthuko yamabhizinisi endaweni yakho.
info.description: Leli khasi liyisizinda sakho sokuthola lonke ulwazi oludingayo, olutholakala kalula. Sebenzisa isihlungi ukukhetha izinsiza ezilungiselelwe isigaba sakho sokuthakasela.

item1.title: Uhlelo Lokusekela Amabhizinisi e-Indalopreneur Climate-smart Cleantech
item1.description: Ukufinyelela kuxhaso lwezimali lwamabhizinisi amancane kanye nosomabhizinisi abasafufusa ukusiza ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo.

item2.title: I-South African Pavilion e-COP29
item2.description: Izibuyekezo mayelana nesinxephezelo sezinhlekelele zokulimala emsebenzini kanye nezifo emkhakheni womnotho oluhlaza.

item3.title: Isikhwama Soxhaso lwe-JET sizoqeda iwindi lokuqala lezicelo ngoDisemba 15
item3.description: Usuku lokugcina olubalulekile lwezicelo zoxhaso lomnotho oluhlaza luyasondela.

events.title: Ikhalenda yemicimbi
events.description: Buka ikhalenda yethu yemicimbi ephilayo futhi uxhumane nosomabhizinisi kanye nochwepheshe ngaphakathi kwesikhala somnotho oluhlaza ngeplathifomu yemicimbi yethu.

login.title: Finyelela Kudeshbhodi Yakho Yomnotho Oluhlaza
login.subtitle: Ngena ukuze ulandelele inqubekela yakho, ufinyelele amathuba oxhaso olwenzelwe wena, futhi uxhumane nenethiwekhi yomnotho oluhlaza.
